scripts.postinstall: yarn-deduplicate && expo-yarn-workspaces check-workspace-dependencies && ([ ! -f node_modules/react-native-svg/src/index.d.ts.orig ] && patch -d node_modules -p2 -f --backup < patches/react-native-svg+13.3.0.patch || true) && yarn workspace @expo/cli prepare
scripts.tsc: echo 'You are trying to run "tsc" in the workspace root. Run it from an individual package instead.' && exit 1
